columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The instance type. For more information, see [ Instance Types ](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/instance-types.html) in the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud User Guide.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The identifier for the location. This depends on the location type. For example, if the location type is region, the location is the Region code (for example, us-east-2.)
